product.name: Spectrum Diversified Euro Round Napkin Holder, Satin Nickel, Model Number: 50278
product.description: Add a great centerpiece to your kitchen or dining room table with the Euro Round Napkin Holder from Spectrum Diversified. Vertical napkin holder makes it easy to grab a napkin when you need to wipe your face, protect your lap from dropped food or soak up a spill. Place on the dining table, kitchen countertop, or breakfast nook. Sturdy base is designed to prevent tipping, wobbling, or toppling. The steel supports the weight of the napkins and distributes the mass evenly along the base, preventing the napkin holder from falling over. This napkin holder keeps your napkins off the table and easily accessible. While created to serve a function in your home, this functional addition will add fashion to your home, too. The stylish design looks great in any kitchen, for a fashionable, functional item in your home. With clean, smooth lines, this organizer inspires an up-to-date look that is fresh and contemporary. The modern finishes complement a variety of kitchen styles and color schemes, showing off your style in the best light. The clean design will add a modern touch to your home. Made of sturdy steel.
product.bullet_points:
• Steel
• Sophisticated Finish: Contain, dispense, and display napkins in a beautiful way with the Euro Round Napkin Holder. The Satin Nickel finish adds a contemporary feel, while complementing a variety of kitchen décor and color schemes.
• Sleek Design: Vertical compact design keeps napkins neatly displayed and upright for quick retrieval.
• Holds Multiple Napkin Sizes: The napkin holder can accommodate standard or cocktail napkins, making it suitable for daily dinners as well as parties.
• Durable Construction: The thick-gauge steel means the napkin holder will last through plenty of use, while the smooth welds ensure that napkins won’t get torn or damaged when removed. To clean, wipe the holder clean with a damp cloth and towel dry. Dimensions 5.5"H x 5.5"W x 3.5"L.
• Spectrum: For over 30 years Spectrum has committed itself to providing innovative storage and organization solutions. We take great pride in listening to our customers and designing items that meet their needs. Spectrum excels at creating unique products that are trendy, functional and built to last.
